wikipedia_page.main: Vanessa Jane Collingridge (born 12 January 1968) is a British author and broadcaster.

response: Collingridge's distant relative, Vanessa Collingridge, published a book on Captain Cook, entitled Captain Cook (2002), and the publication of this book has caused a certain resurgence of interest in George Collingridge in recent years.
On 10 February 2016, the Red Lodge was used in the BBC Four documentary Queen Elizabeth I: A Timewatch Guide with shots of Vanessa Collingridge in the Reception Room, Great Oak Room, and knot garden.

His media career began in developing popular history pieces for Sky Movies. The 4-part film documentary Captain Cook: Obsession and Discovery was screened in 2007 in Australia on ABC and in the United Kingdom on The History Channel.IMDb He joined the English author Vanessa Collingridge and naval historian Professor Andrew Lambert.Captain Cook on Screen Australia
